view.classes

Class AdderComponentPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.classes.AdderComponentPanel

  • public final class AdderComponentPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class adds the graphical components to a panel with GridBagLayout.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponent(javax.swing.JPanel p, javax.swing.JComponent c, int x, int y, int gwidth, int gheight, int align, int insTop, int insBottom, java.awt.GridBagLayout layout)
      Adds the component to the panel with a specific layout.
      static AdderComponentPanel getAdder()
      Returns the object associated with the current Java application.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAdder

        public static AdderComponentPanel getAdder()
        Returns the object associated with the current Java application. Most of the methods of class AdderComponentPanel are instance methods and must be invoked with respect to the current object.
        Returns:
        the object associated with the current Java application.

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent(javax.swing.JPanel p,
                         javax.swing.JComponent c,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int gwidth,
                         int gheight,
                         int align,
                         int insTop,
                         int insBottom,
                         java.awt.GridBagLayout layout)
        Adds the component to the panel with a specific layout. Each integer value passed is a parameter to place the component within the panel.
        Parameters:
        p - the panel where must be added the JComponent.
        c - the component that must be added.
        x - the number of the column.
        y - the number of the row.
        gwidth - the number of the columns occupied by the component.
        gheight - the number of the rows occupied by the component.
        align - the position of the component in the cell.
        insTop - the top edge of the component.
        insBottom - the bottom edge of the component.
        layout - the layout that must be applied the association between the component and the GridBagConstraints.
